title: PneumoStabSim Application Settings
description: Schema describing the consolidated application configuration.

metadata.description: Metadata describing the origin and version of the configuration file.

version.description: Semantic version of the settings payload (major.minor.patch).

last_modified.description: ISO8601 timestamp of the last modification.

units_version.description: Identifier of the unit system applied to numeric parameters.

schema_version.description: Internal schema version for migration tracking.

migrated_from.description: Historical pointer to the legacy module that supplied defaults.

migration_date.description: Date of the most recent migration to the consolidated format.

description.description: Human readable summary of the configuration state.

total_parameters.description: Approximate count of stored leaf parameters.

previous_version.description: Version recorded prior to the last migration run.

units_version_previous.description: Previous unit system identifier retained for diagnostics.

current.description: Runtime values currently used by the simulator.

defaults_snapshot.description: Snapshot used for the reset-to-defaults workflow.

color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

position_x.description: Horizontal offset for the fill light.

color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

position_y.description: Vertical position of the light in meters.

range.description: Effective radius of the point light.

color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

position_y.description: Vertical position of the spot light in meters.

range.description: Effective distance of the spot light.

position_x.description: Horizontal offset along the X axis.

position_z.description: Depth offset along the Z axis.

background_color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

skybox_enabled.description: Enable rendering of the HDR skybox.

ibl_intensity.description: Intensity multiplier applied to the IBL probe.

probe_brightness.description: Exposure offset for the reflection probe.

probe_horizon.description: Vertical horizon shift applied to the probe.

ibl_source.description: Path to the primary HDRI source.

ibl_fallback.description: Fallback HDRI path used when the main source is unavailable.

skybox_blur.description: Gaussian blur factor applied to the skybox texture.

ibl_offset_x.description: Horizontal offset applied to the HDR probe.

ibl_offset_y.description: Vertical offset applied to the HDR probe.

ibl_bind_to_camera.description: Bind the probe to the active camera position.

fog_color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

fog_density.description: Base density of the exponential fog.

fog_near.description: Start distance of the fog in meters.

fog_far.description: End distance of the fog in meters.

fog_least_intense_y.description: Altitude with minimal fog density in meters.

fog_most_intense_y.description: Altitude with maximal fog density in meters.

fog_height_curve.description: Exponent controlling the fog height gradient.

fog_transmit_enabled.description: Enable light transmission through fog volume.

ao_strength.description: Multiplier applied to the SSAO contribution.

ao_radius.description: Sample radius for SSAO in meters.

ao_softness.description: Blur kernel size applied to SSAO.

ao_dither.description: Enable dithering to mitigate SSAO banding.

ao_sample_rate.description: Number of samples per pixel used for SSAO.

bias.description: Depth bias applied during shadow rendering.

quality.description: Quality preset for the primary AA technique.

taa_motion_adaptive.description: Enable motion adaptive weighting in TAA.

fxaa_enabled.description: Toggle FXAA when TAA is disabled.

specular_aa.description: Enable specular anti-aliasing for rough materials.

dithering.description: Enable filmic dithering to mask banding.

render_scale.description: Render resolution scale relative to the display output.

frame_rate_limit.description: Target frame rate cap in frames per second.

preset.description: Name of the active quality preset.

cylinder_segments.description: Number of radial segments used for the cylinder mesh.

cylinder_rings.description: Number of vertical rings used for the cylinder mesh.

bias.description: Depth bias applied during shadow rendering.

quality.description: Quality preset for the primary AA technique.

taa_motion_adaptive.description: Enable motion adaptive weighting in TAA.

fxaa_enabled.description: Toggle FXAA when TAA is disabled.

specular_aa.description: Enable specular anti-aliasing for rough materials.

dithering.description: Enable filmic dithering to mask banding.

render_scale.description: Render resolution scale relative to the display output.

frame_rate_limit.description: Target frame rate cap in frames per second.

fov.description: Camera vertical field of view in degrees.

near.description: Near clipping plane distance in meters.

far.description: Far clipping plane distance in meters.

auto_rotate_speed.description: Speed of the automatic rotation in degrees per second.

auto_fit.description: Automatically frame the model on load.

manual_camera.description: Toggle manual vs. orchestrated camera modes.

camera_pos_x.description: Camera X position in world space.

camera_pos_y.description: Camera Y position in world space.

camera_pos_z.description: Camera Z position in world space.

orbit_target_x.description: X coordinate of the orbit focus point.

orbit_target_y.description: Y coordinate of the orbit focus point.

orbit_target_z.description: Z coordinate of the orbit focus point.

orbit_distance.description: Distance from camera to orbit target in meters.

orbit_inertia_enabled.description: Enable inertial smoothing for orbit controls.

orbit_inertia.description: Strength of the orbit inertia smoothing.

orbit_rotate_smoothing.description: Smoothing factor applied to orbit rotation.

orbit_pan_smoothing.description: Smoothing factor applied to orbit panning.

orbit_zoom_smoothing.description: Smoothing factor applied to orbit zooming.

orbit_friction.description: Friction applied to orbit inertia decay.

world_scale.description: Uniform world scale applied to the scene root.

alpha_cutoff.description: Alpha cutoff threshold for masked materials.

alpha_mode.description: Alpha blending mode for the material.

attenuation_color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

base_color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

emissive_color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

metalness.description: Metalness factor for the PBR material.

normal_strength.description: Strength applied to the normal map.

specular_tint.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

alpha_cutoff.description: Alpha cutoff threshold for masked materials.

alpha_mode.description: Alpha blending mode for the material.

base_color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

emissive_color.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

metalness.description: Metalness factor for the PBR material.

normal_strength.description: Strength applied to the normal map.

specular_tint.description: Hex encoded RGB or RGBA color.

bloom_glow_strength.description: Additional glow contribution added to bloom.

bloom_hdr_max.description: Upper HDR range used for bloom normalization.

bloom_hdr_scale.description: Scaling applied to HDR inputs before bloom.

bloom_bicubic_upscale.description: Use bicubic upscaling when recombining bloom.

dof_focus_distance.description: Distance from the camera to the focus plane in meters.

dof_blur.description: Blur intensity for depth of field.

lens_flare_ghost_count.description: Number of ghost images in the lens flare.

lens_flare_bloom_bias.description: Bias applied when blending bloom and flare.

lens_flare_stretch_to_aspect.description: Stretch lens flare to match display aspect ratio.

cylinder_cap_length_m.description: Cylinder end cap length in meters.

tail_mount_offset_m.description: Offset of the tail mounting point in meters.

rod_position.description: Normalized rod position along the cylinder stroke.

frame_to_pivot.description: Distance from frame reference to pivot in meters.

joint_arm_scale.description: Scale applied to the arm joint mesh.

joint_rod_scale.description: Scale applied to the rod joint mesh.

joint_tail_scale.description: Scale applied to the tail joint mesh.

interference_check.description: Enable runtime interference checking for geometry.

lever_length.description: Legacy lever length preserved for compatibility.

link_rod_diameters.description: Toggle automatic synchronization of rod diameters.

cv_atmo_dia.description: Atmospheric check valve diameter in meters.

cv_atmo_dp.description: Pressure differential for atmospheric check valve in Pascals.

cv_tank_dia.description: Tank check valve diameter in meters.

cv_tank_dp.description: Pressure differential for tank check valve in Pascals.

master_isolation_open.description: State of the master isolation valve.

receiver_volume.description: Receiver tank volume in cubic meters.

relief_min_pressure.description: Minimum pressure before relief valve opens (Pa).

relief_safety_pressure.description: Maximum safe pressure for the relief valve (Pa).

relief_stiff_pressure.description: Pressure threshold for stiff relief valve response (Pa).

throttle_stiff_dia.description: Throttle diameter used in stiff mode in meters.

mode_preset.description: Preset identifier for the motion generator.

thermo_mode.description: Thermodynamic mode propagated to pneumatic subsystem.

amplitude.description: Normalized amplitude of the motion profile.

lf_phase.description: Left-front wheel phase offset in radians.

rf_phase.description: Right-front wheel phase offset in radians.

lr_phase.description: Left-rear wheel phase offset in radians.

rr_phase.description: Right-rear wheel phase offset in radians.

include_springs.description: Include spring elements in the simulation.

include_dampers.description: Include damper elements in the simulation.

render_vsync_hz.description: Refresh rate used when VSync is enabled.

max_steps_per_frame.description: Maximum physics substeps per rendered frame.

max_frame_time.description: Maximum allowed frame time for stability heuristics.
